text: @justenleonas I no longer have a working nintendo (a broken one yes) but i still have my copy of this game.  I play through it on the Wii or my 3ds at least once a year.  As much as i still love zelda, the original (and the sequel) held such a promise of more to me.  I was young so my imagination filled in the gaps with the help of the animations in the instruction book.  Zelda wasnt cutesy back then....a lot of wonder on where they could have gone with that series.

text:
Easily the best video game series in existence. When people ask me why I'm a Nintendo fan boy, "The Legend of Zelda" is my reply. In all its long years, it's done so much, advanced so far, and touched so many. The Ocarina of Time basically created the concept of real 3D RPG gaming. 
My life would seriously not be the same without ever having this.
